title: Interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream for a single or married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about feces: Feces are considered one of the unpleasant things in life, as seeing them in a dream causes anxiety and confusion for many, as the interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream varies depending on the person’s condition and according to the form of the feces. Who sees in a dream, as this vision has many signs and associations, which we will discuss in detail through our article on the interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream Feces can be one of the disgusting things in life, but it is often considered one of the praiseworthy visions, Where it is useful for those who have the vision. Below we will present the following points to interpret a dream about feces in a dream: Seeing feces in a dream indicates comfort, because the dreamer was going through hardship that disturbed his life. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is flushing in the toilet, this indicates that the dreamer will get rid of evil and return to calm and peace in His life. Whoever sees foul-smelling feces in his dream, this indicates the immoralities and sins that the dreamer committed, but he repented to God with sincere repentance. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that his clothes are dirty with feces, this means that he will lose a lot of his money in the coming days. If you see Feces in your dream and you are sad in the dream, this indicates false statements being made about you and that there are those who seek to defame you. Seeing feces in the toilet indicates that God will answer the prayer of the one who sees the vision and relieve his need. Whoever sees himself in a dream defecating, this is an indication However, he will travel abroad to work and get a lot of money, which may change his life for the better. But whoever sees himself unable to defecate, this is a sign that he will find it difficult to achieve his goals and desires. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a frozen sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream Stool in the dream of a single girl. There are many interpretations of the dream of stool. It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer curious to search for the interpretation of this dream. A girl seeing stool in her dream has many connotations and interpretations that we will mention in the following points: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she defecates easily in the toilet. This indicates the happy events and discoveries that she will experience in her next life, God willing. Stool in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will obtain an inheritance or a job that will bring her a large profit. For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that she is defecating in the toilet, this may indicate that There is a young man who will propose to her and she will live a happy, happy and stable life with him. This vision indicates that the unmarried girl will escape from the machinations of some vile people. But if an unmarried girl sees herself cleaning the seed from the bathroom, this means that she will get rid of all obstacles that may stand in her way. Fulfilling her dreams. Also, cleaning feces indicates success in scientific and practical life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a black bear for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about feces in a married woman’s dream. This vision in a married woman’s dream has many connotations and interpretations.

title: Interpretation of gold in a dream: seeing gold in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of gold for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a divorced woman, a married man, or a single young man, whether she wears a gift, sells, buys, loses, or finds a ring, chain, pendant, pendant, etc., according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and al-Nabulsi. Meanings of the appearance of gold in a dream: Whoever sees that he has obtained a large piece of Gold will gain leadership. Seeing gold in general indicates livelihood, liberation, good deeds, and the end of worries, and indicates children, guidance, and knowledge. If silver turns into gold in a dream, this indicates that the situation will improve. Seeing pure gold or silver indicates purity of intentions and sincerity. Whoever wears gold will meet oppressors, and whoever gets The gold alloy will be affected by them. The ring is made of gold, so in a dream it can indicate an innovation, and whoever sees a gold bracelet on his hands can get money. Gold in a dream is Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says in his book “The Perfume of Al-Anam in Interpreting a Dream”: Gold in a dream indicates the appearance An unpleasant thing, and it was also said that gold in a dream portends problems and fears. If a man dreams that he is wearing something made of gold, then he will marry a people who are not superior to him in lineage or lineage. Al-Nabulsi said: Whoever sees in his dream that he is melting gold, then he will quarrel over an issue. It is obnoxious, and it may have fallen on the tongues of people. If he saw in his dream that he obtained a large piece of gold, he will make a decision or leadership. As for whoever saw in his dream that he found an authentic gold dinar, then in his waking life he may see the king or ruler and gain great benefit from him. Or good. It is not appropriate to interpret the vision of gold casting, because it may indicate a dispute, quarrel, or something of the like. As for the one who sees in his dream that his house is made of gold, he may fear for that house from fire or damage. As for the one who sees in his dream that His hands have become gold, then he may fear for himself of unemployment or depression. If he dreams that he has eyes of gold, then he may fear for himself from the adversities of this world, and it is said that he fears for himself lest he lose sight. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a gold or silver necklace on his chest Or beads or jewelry, entrusted to a presidency, ministry, or state, and holding a secretariat or a high position. Gold in women’s dreams is praiseworthy; Because some of them indicate joy in a dream, some of them indicate livelihood or money, and some of them indicate gold in the interpretation of children or sons. Gold in a woman’s dream indicates a good deed on her part, and it is said that gold in interpretation indicates the release of tragedies and worries for the one who He experienced troubles or sorrows, and he is hated by those who lived in luxury or ease and bliss. Gold in a woman’s dream often refers to a husband or friend, and seeing it is praiseworthy and one of the omens, especially for women who live in rather harsh or difficult circumstances. Gold in a dream symbolizes a woman’s nobility and dignity, as well as a man’s knowledge and wisdom, provided that he does not The melting of gold. What is praiseworthy in interpretation, according to Al-Nabulsi’s approach, is that he sees the sleeper in his sleep as if he had gold with him that suddenly turned into silver. What is praiseworthy in interpretation is that the sleeper sees in his dream a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a passport and the meaning of obtaining a passport

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dreaming about a passport in a dream. Is a passport in a dream a good omen? Through a website in a dream, see the opinion of interpreters who dream of seeing a passport in a dream, the meaning of a dream interpretation of a passport and a visa, the interpretation of a dream about obtaining a passport, and the interpretation of losing a passport. In a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a passport. A passport in a dream is good news for the dreamer in many matters, but the interpretation depends on the vision. Seeing a passport in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better. Seeing a passport in a dream may be good news for travel in reality. Interpretation of a passport in a dream may indicate the removal of anxiety, sadness, and loss of livelihood. Seeing a visa and passport in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy. Seeing a diplomatic passport in a dream indicates a bright future, success in studies, and reaching high positions. Seeing that you have a passport Traveling to America is a sign of a great victory in life. See also: Traveling to Turkey in a dream Traveling to America in a dream Passport in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a passport for a pregnant woman indicates the safety and completion of her pregnancy, God willing. Dreaming about a passport for a married woman is a sign of the return of a dear person On her heart. Seeing a passport in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she will get something expensive that she was missing. Seeing a green passport in a dream for a man is evidence that something in his life has passed and will bring goodness. Interpretation of a dream about a passport and a visaInterpretation of a dream A passport and a visa in a dream are a sign of the arrival of sustenance and huge wealth. Interpretation of a dream about a passport and a visa, and a member of the dreamer’s family was with him, heralding a happy occasion. Interpretation of a dream about a passport and a visa, in which a friend with the fortuneteller had good news about a new job. Interpretation of a dream about obtaining a passport. Interpretation The dream of obtaining a passport and a visa in a dream is a sign of the fulfillment of ambitions and aspirations. The interpretation of the dream of obtaining a passport in dreams can also be a sign of your good behavior. Seeing the acquisition of a passport in a sad atmosphere in a dream, means separation from someone close to the dreamer. Losing a passport Traveling in a dream: Dreaming about losing your passport could be a sign that you will lose joy and happiness. Seeing losing your passport in a dream indicates the dreamer’s unhappiness in his married life. Interpretation of dreaming about losing your passport symbolizes failure in life and can also symbolize the dreamer being fired from his job. Seeing the loss or losing of a passport in a dream means that the dreamer will be exposed to problems and be criticized for negligence. Seeing the loss of a passport in a dream indicates weakness and poverty that the dreamer is going through. Interpretation of dreaming of losing a passport in a dream is evidence that the dreamer needs the help of those around him. Interpretation Losing the lawnmower and then finding it again, which is an indication that the dreamer has gone through a difficult stage in his life. I read about it: Traveling to a foreign country in a dream The stage of dreams for a single woman The passport in a dream for a single woman Interpretation

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a dead person eating in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a dead person eating in a dream. Many people search for interpretations of their dreams, especially when some dead people leave our world. Many people may feel anxious and panic when they see a dead relative in a dream, especially when they see them eating, and these are among the things that may be mentioned. Many interpretation scholars have some opinions on this matter, which we will learn about in the following lines. Interpretation of eating a dead person in a dream if it is seen The dead person eats food and the dreamer shares it with him, and the dead person was one of the people of righteousness and piety during his life, then this indicates that good company will bring them together later, but if he was one. From immoral people before his death, this is evidence of exposure to worries and anguish, and perhaps the loss of many blessings from the dreamer. When you see a dead woman, eating food, and the dreamer eats with her, this is a sign of blessing in the dreamer’s life. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading interpreters For dreams and visions in the Arab world. The dead person is eating in a dream. If the dead person in a dream is in good health, and is seen eating, then this is evidence of good health and longevity for the dreamer. If the dead person is seen eating a type of favorite sweet, this means that he is blessed in his grave, and it may also indicate That the dreamer will receive a lot of sustenance, which is also an indication of the abundance of destiny. The arrival of zakat to the dead person, and if he eats with him, indicates that some of the lost money will be returned to him, or money that he gains from what is not counted. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating meat: If they see him eating any type of meat, then it is an indication of the goodness that the dreamer possesses, and if it is raw, then it is Not in his favor, and evidence of problems, judgments, and perhaps some problems. . By inheritance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if he asks for food himself in the dream, this is evidence that he needs alms from the neighborhood, and his dream in this vision comes to be a message to him, as much as his need for good deeds and supplication. His need for food will be in the dream. When the dreamer watches him and eats bread and it is fresh and delicious, it is a means of livelihood that the dreamer will acquire, and it will come to him through a follower who has this quality or through him as an inheritance or admiration. Sources:- 1- The Book of Interpretation of Optimistic Dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin Al-Iman Library, Cairo. 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, research by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The Book of Perfumes in Expressing Dreams, Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi. 4- The Book of Signs in the World of Expressions, Imam al-Mahir Ghars al-Din Khalil bin Shaheen al-Dhaheri, researched by Sayyid Kasrawi Hassan, Dar al-Kutub al-Ilmiyyah, Beirut 1993.

title: Interpretation of incense in a dream Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of incense in a dream Al-Osaimi Many people search for the interpretation of incense in a dream, in which some people see this dream and do not understand its meaning. Others have a pleasant and intelligent scent that brings calm and tranquility to the soul, especially when perfumed at home on Friday. It has power and grace in expelling demons and breaking magic. It also attracts angels to the house that continues to evaporate. Interpretation of incense in a dream. Al-Osaimi. The scientist Dr. Fahd Al-Osaimi has provided interpretations of many visions and dreams that A person can dream of it in his dreams, like him in this, like Imam Muhammad bin Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen and others. . . Other prominent scientists gave the science of dream interpretation a significant part of their lives. Beware of dreams interpreted by Al-Osaimi: Seeing incense in a dream. The symbol of incense in a dream. Below are the symbols of seeing incense in a dream: The smell of incense in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will hear what will make him happy soon. Evaporation in a dream, whether one is evaporating himself or being done by someone Another for his sake, indicates the dreamer’s good behavior and upright character. Incense in a dream indicates the return of absence and the end of disputes between the two opponents. Carrying an incense burner in a dream symbolizes the fulfillment of a wish that the dreamer has been calling upon God for some time. The appearance of an incense stick from another incense plant, such as a plant, indicates God Almighty blesses God, the Most High, the Righteous, the Knowing, the Truthful. Evaporation in a dream symbolizes a speedy recovery from illness by God’s command, and it also indicates salvation from witchcraft if the dreamer is affected by that. Whoever abandons worship, commits sins, and sees himself expelled in the dream, then this is a good dream. It indicates the approach of repentance and a return to the path of truth. An unpleasant dream in a dream is seeing someone who was hiding a secret and burning incense, and this indicates that he or someone else revealed this secret and told people about it. Interpretation of buying incense for a single woman in a dream Seeing incense in a dream has meanings There are many that we mention as follows: Buying incense in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her readiness to marry in the near future to a good man who has a good reputation and is well-off. Inhaling incense in a dream and enjoying its scent symbolizes hearing good news and God Almighty responding to her prayers. Incense in a dream for an unmarried woman represents luck. Happy and successful in her professional and scientific life. Incense in a dream for an unmarried woman suffering from an organic disease or one related to magic, indicates recovery by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about incense for a pregnant womanIn the following points we present the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees incense in a dream: A pregnant woman smells incense In a dream, the smell is smart and pleasant, which indicates the cessation of the pain and problems that she faces as a result of pregnancy. Filling the house with incense in a dream indicates that the date of birth is approaching and that it will be an easy task by God’s command. Incense in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the birth of a good and righteous child with his parents, save The Book of God Almighty. Through this article, we have presented the various interpretations of seeing incense in a dream, those dreams worthy of

The vision of buying amber rice in a dream is considered one of the visions that bring livelihood and money because it is an important and desirable thing that one can see. title: Thirst in a dream and the interpretation of extreme thirst in a dream

preview.html: Feeling thirsty or feeling thirsty in a dream is subject to many interpretations and interpretations, depending on the degree of thirst. It is natural or normal thirst, and there is extreme thirst called thirst. Therefore, in this article, we will try to present the different cases and types of thirst. Interpretation of a dream about thirst in a dream: Thirst in a dream is a strong need for money and also symbolizes emotional deprivation. Thirst in a man’s dream indicates fatigue in matters related to livelihood, and in a woman’s dreams it symbolizes emotional problems. Thirst is preferred in dreams if it is quenched, and it is better to quench it in a dream with milk or water, and it is not good in a dream to quench his thirst by drinking coffee or wine. Interpretation of thirst in one dream: An unmarried girl may feel in her dreams as if she is thirsty, and in her dream she may lack that water or Any drink that eliminates the feeling of thirst. In fact, this dream indicates a serious emotional emptiness and may indicate estrangement from friends or loved ones. As for a girl who sees in her dream that she is drinking or quenching her thirst, this clearly indicates the disappearance of problems and worries, especially if what she drinks in the dream is water, juice, or Something like this. Thirst in a single woman’s dream can indicate a thirst for something, a certain feeling, or a certain situation. The girl may feel very thirsty as she waits for the test result, and her throat may feel dry because she is afraid of this result. Thirst in this context can inform the fortuneteller of waiting or impatience of a specific person. Thirst in a married woman’s dream: A married woman feels in her dream that she is in a state of thirst when she suffers from her husband’s alienation or lack of interest in her. A married woman may also feel thirsty in her dream when she is in financial need, because lack of money may be represented by hunger or thirst in the interpretation of dreams. Thirst in a pregnant woman’s dream. We had mentioned in a previous article about this article that feeling thirsty and hungry are indicators of a male baby, as Irrigation indicates the presence of a female. Extreme thirst or thirst in the interpretation of dreams. Extreme thirst or extreme thirst in visions is that painful and sometimes harsh feeling that a person feels when he is in a place or place where there is no water at all, such as a desert, and the sleeper sees as if his water sources are exhausted. . This dream, in reality, indicates a stifling financial crisis that the dreamer may be experiencing, and indicates his inability to pay his debts or his living expenses. The dream of extreme thirst is related to the lack of livelihood resources in the country in which he lives. If the dreamer sees himself dying after that, his dream indicates an improvement in circumstances and a gradual decline of the situation. Seeing a thirsty person in a dream, like a thirsty person in a dream, like a hungry person, both shows greed and extreme flattery. And a desire to benefit from God or usurp his abilities. In these dreams, it is good for the monarch to offer water to the thirsty: If he sees it full and continues, then the dream indicates the dreamer’s safety from the plots of the greedy. However, if he sees this person continuing to be thirsty, then he shows extreme greed or envy and hatred sometimes, and the dreamer must take caution and caution to ensure his safety and the security of his livelihood. Or ast

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling dogs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about selling dogs in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about selling dogs in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil. Interpretation is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about selling dogs in a dream may indicate to anyone who dreams of buying a dog. To a material loss that the dreamer may suffer in his business. Dreaming of selling a dog in a dream may indicate changes in his life during these days. In the event that one sees that he is selling a dog, this may indicate harm that the owner of the vision may be exposed to, which he will overcome with grace. God. In the event that one sees that he is selling a dog, this may indicate happy events that will come his way in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about hearing dogs in a dream: A person who dreams that dogs are barking may indicate that he did not listen to the advice and that they should listen If one saw that dogs were barking loudly, this may indicate hatred or hostility that the dreamer may face. Dreaming about hearing the sound of dogs in a dream is a sign that may indicate that there is an enemy near him and he must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a dog in a dream: It may indicate that a dog is stolen In a dream, it indicates the loss of some important things from the dreamer’s life. Whoever dreams that he stole a dog may indicate financial distress that he may be exposed to and that he will overcome. Seeing dogs being stolen in a dream may indicate some family problems that the dreamer may face during those days. And if The person saw that he stole the dog, this may indicate his good condition and the positive changes that occurred to him during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dog excrement in a dream Seeing dog excrement in a dream may indicate the presence of enemies surrounding the dreamer and he must be careful. Everyone who sees dog excrement In his dream, it may indicate that he will encounter some problems and difficulties in his life during that period and he must seek help from God. If one sees feces in a dream, this may indicate a financial crisis that the dreamer may face and that he will overcome soon. In the case of seeing dog droppings, this may indicate To changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sleeping dogs in a dream: Seeing dogs sleeping in a dream may indicate getting rid of an enemy you were facing at that time. If you notice the presence of sleeping dogs in the dream, this may indicate changes. Bad things happen in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing sleeping dogs may indicate fears that the dreamer may face during those days. If one sees that there are sleeping dogs, this may indicate that the dreamer will be subject to envy and malice and will have to seek help from Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream Dogs sleeping with each other in a dream Dogs mating in a dream can indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this time. In the event that a person sees dogs sleeping with each other, this may indicate happy events that come to the dreamer after the difficulties he has encountered Seeing dogs mating in a dream may indicate getting rid of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing electrical cables in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of electrical cables in a dream? The interpretation of seeing electrical cables in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will get rid of all his problems and fears that he suffers from. Seeing electrical wires on the road in a dream means travel and journey, as well as moving from one place to another. A dream of holding electrical cables also indicates the days The difficulty that the owner of this dream is suffering from. Connecting electrical wires together in a dream means a lot of trouble and family and marital conflict. Seeing yourself climbing an electrical pole in a dream is seen as achieving goals and fulfilling desires and ambitions. Interpretation of a dream about connecting electrical cablesSeeing connecting electrical wires in The dream means family communication, putting an end to problems, and means goodness and contentment. The interpretation of seeing electrical cables connected to homes indicates to the dreamer the high status he enjoys in his work. Seeing that wires are connected in the wrong way in a dream indicates continuous mistakes from which this person does not learn. If you see an electrical cable connected With a television in a dream, this indicates a high position, status, and achievement of goals. Interpretation of a dream about burning electrical cablesInterpretation of seeing electrical cables burning in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that indicate illness and extreme exhaustion. Burning electrical cables in a dream is a sign of difficult days and tiring stages that The dreamer suffers from it. Also, dreaming of fire on electrical cables is a dream that indicates sadness, delusion, and anxiety. Extinguishing a fire in a dream is a harbinger of goodness, happiness, and an end to all the problems and obstacles that the dreamer suffered from. Interpretation of a dream about cutting an electrical cable: Seeing yourself cutting electrical cables on the road in a dream is A sign of problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face. Also, seeing a married man cutting an electricity cable in a dream indicates his marital problems and the divorce of his wife. Seeing this dream in an unmarried girl’s dreams indicates the end of her relationship with the person in her life. Interpretation of a dream about burning electricity cables for single women. Seeing a burning Electrical wires in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the unwanted dreams that indicate her failure in life. Also, seeing an electrical wire burning in the path of the girl who facilitates it means that there are many haters and jealous people. Interpretation of seeing an electrical shortcut in a dream: Seeing an electrical shortcut in a dream To many bad things that the dreamer will experience in his next life. The interpretation of seeing an electric diamond in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates that the dreamer is exposed to many problems and conspiracies. Seeing this dream has many meanings, as it is a sign of evil that will affect the dreamer and an indication of changes. Unhappy in his life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing Mambare in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Mumbar in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Interpretation of seeing Mumbar in a dream. According to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, depending on the condition of the dreamer, follow us. Interpretation of seeing Mumbar in a dream. Eating Mumbar in a dream. It indicates that the fortuneteller is an extravagant person. A lot of money is wasted on trivial and useless matters. Seeing a delicious and delicious Mambaru in a dream indicates promising events in the life of the fortuneteller. Sharing the Mambaru between the dreamer and another person in a dream. It indicates that there will be a mutually beneficial relationship between this person and the fortuneteller. See other interpretations: Interpretation Seeing eating chicken in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing mumbar in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman eating mumbar in a dream announces that the coming period of her life will be full of happiness, joy and pleasure. Cooking mumbar in a dream for a single womanIt indicates that she will achieve great success and excel in her academic and professional life. Mumbar is corrupt. With an unpleasant smell in an unmarried woman’s dream, it says that she will face many worries and crises in the coming period of her life. Seeing a student eating chicken in a dream announces that God will reward her for her efforts and she will pass her exams with high grades and be a source of pride for her parents. See also: Interpretation of seeing eating chicken in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a vision Mambars in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman cleaning mambars in a dream indicates the end of all her worries and problems in her life and the beginning of a new phase. Eating cooked mambars in a dream for a married woman indicates that he is living a married life full of happiness, stability and peace. Seeing a married woman eating spoiled mambars in a dream says that she is passing through She is going through a difficult time due to many problems and disagreements that cause her sadness and exhaustion. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating with someone she loves. Interpretation of seeing mambar in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant mambar in a dream indicates an abundance of happy events and promising news in the coming period of her life. Eating mambar in a dream for a woman Pregnant woman: It appears that she will undergo an easy and effortless birth process without feeling any pain or fatigue. Frying mumbar in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she is thinking a lot about the birth process and what might happen to her and feels anxious and panicked. Interpretation of seeing mumbar in a dream for a man. Rotten mumbar in a dream for a man indicates that he will suffer heavy losses. In his life, and God knows best. Buying cooked mambar in a dream for a man, this indicates that God will give him a lot of goodness and money in his life. Seeing a man eating delicious stuffed mambar in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller’s conditions and conditions will improve for the better in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing chickpeas in a dream. Interpretation Eating intestines in a dream means that he is eating pig intestines, which indicates that the dreamer has faced many failures in his personal and professional life, and God knows best. Eating intestines in a dream is the dreamer’s action in many bad deeds and committing sins.
